services.mainTitle: What is a market research agency?
services.mainDescription: It is a firm focused on generating and analyzing information so that companies can make better decisions. While advertising is the "emotional side" of marketing, market research is the "rational side" of marketing.
services.servicesDescription: Our advantage is the ability to translate graphs and numbers into effective strategies for our clients. The variety of sectors we have served for more than 20 years speak for themselves, and below we tell you about our services.

1.name: Face-to-Face Surveys (CAPI)
1.description: It is one of the most used quantitative techniques in marketing, carried out in homes, shopping centers, and population points. It allows obtaining detailed and precise information directly from respondents.

2.name: Telephone Survey (CATI)
2.description: Better known as Computer Assisted Telephone Interviewing (CATI), it is an agile, precise, and economical market research method. It facilitates rapid data collection from a wide geographic sample.

3.name: Online Survey
3.description: Email Surveys or CAWI (Computer Assisted Web Interview) is the same technique used in CAPI or CATI but through personalized links for people to respond to questionnaires. It offers flexibility and convenience for participants, increasing response rates.

4.name: Mystery Shopper
4.description: A professional agent poses as a consumer to analyze the conduct, behavior, and attitudes of employees in a company. This technique provides a unique view of the real customer experience.

5.name: In-Depth Interviews
5.description: It is a very specific qualitative technique, as it seeks to collect information from people with defined profiles and generally with very busy schedules. It allows obtaining valuable and detailed insights on complex topics.

6.name: Focus Groups
6.description: Focus groups can be ONLINE or IN-PERSON. They are a qualitative technique highly requested by companies launching new products or advertising campaigns. They allow exploring the perceptions and opinions of a diverse group interactively.

7.name: Desk Research
7.description: INEGI, specific databases, specialized studies, and our links with various university centers give us a very broad menu of quality sources to strengthen our market studies. This methodology offers a comprehensive vision based on reliable and updated data.

8.name: Consulting and Marketing
8.description: The world has changed and so has marketing. Are you ready? We can help you with your marketing plans and strategies. Our personalized approach adapts to your business's unique needs in today's digital environment.
